channel.title: R Epidemics Consortium
channel.description: We are a group of international experts in infectious disease modelling, Public Health, and software development who collaborate to create the next generation of analysis tools for disease outbreak response using the R software

item.title: The world has ended
item.description: Well, looks like we should have taken our job as epidemiologists a bit more seriouslyâ€¦ that latest virus that started in Africa wiped out 86% of the world population in the past 2 weeks. Whoops.

item.title: RECON is live!
item.description: The R Epidemics CONsortium finally has a website - Thanks to Dean Attali, RECON now has a proper website. Woohoo!
